short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome Plugin to bring JavaScript functionalities to Google spreadsheets and Microsoft Excel

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you are someone who works with a spreadsheet regularly, you know how time-consuming and tedious it can be to modify data cell by cell. Fortunately, there is a solution that can save you both time and money: the Excel Transformation Tool Google Chrome extension.

This powerful tool allows you to modify every cell of an .xlsx quickly and easily using the most accessible coding language ever built, JavaScript. With just a few lines of code, you can perform complex data transformations that would take hours to do manually.  You could query OpenAI (ChatGPT) for every row, providing your cell data as partial input.

One of the best things about the Excel Transformation Tool is how easy it is to use. Even if you have never coded before, you can start using this tool right away. The interface is intuitive and user-friendly, and there are plenty of examples and tutorials to help you get started.

With the Excel Transformation Tool, you can perform a wide range of data transformations, from simple arithmetic operations to complex string manipulations. You can also use regular expressions to search and replace text, split and merge cells, and even perform operations on entire rows and columns.

But the real power of the Excel Transformation Tool is in its ability to automate repetitive tasks. If you find yourself performing the same data transformations over and over again, this tool can save you hours of time. With just a few lines of code, you can create macros that automate your workflow and make your job much easier.

The Excel Transformation Tool is also incredibly versatile. It works with all kinds of spreadsheets, from small personal budgets to large corporate databases. And because it is a Chrome extension, you can use it on any device that has Google Chrome installed.

In addition to its powerful features and ease of use, the Excel Transformation Tool also has a thriving community of users who have contributed a wide range of functions that can be downloaded and shared with colleagues. This community repository of functions is an excellent resource for anyone who wants to save time and avoid reinventing the wheel.

Overall, the Excel Transformation Tool is an essential tool for anyone who works with spreadsheets. Whether you are a small business owner, a data analyst, or a student, this tool can help you save time and money while also making your job easier. With its easy-to-use interface, powerful features, and cost-effectiveness, it is a must-have for anyone who wants to streamline their workflow and improve their productivity.
